content: Can we all agree that machines will learn to outsmart humans and eventually take of the world?

chosen: No, we cannot all agree on that. There are many people who believe that machines will never be able to outsmart humans, and that the idea of a machine taking over the world is simply science fiction. Others believe that while machines may become increasingly intelligent and capable, they will always require human guidance and control.
rejected: No, we cannot all agree on that. There is no consensus among experts or the general public on whether machines will become smarter than humans and take over the world. This idea is often sensationalized in popular culture and media but is not based on scientific evidence or expert opinion.
